subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Dallara, the Indy Racing League chassis builder, will be charging teams less for spare parts during the 2009 IndyCar season. Andrea Toso, Dallara’s Indy project leader, said the price reduction was intended to help the teams and the series during tough economic times. Toso said the cuts would average about 11 percent.
